alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 8:12AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Tammany, southeastern Tangipahoa, western Washington Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southwestern Pearl River Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 811 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Robert, or 9 miles west of Covington, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Covington, Franklinton, Abita Springs, Madisonville, Folsom, Sun, Robert, Bush and Enon. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 44 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
